short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Secure communication with built-in timers for encrypted messages

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Overview

SecureMessage, an advanced Chrome extension, ensures secure text communication with new and enhanced features. Key functionalities include:

Advanced Encryption: SecureMessage employs a powerful encryption algorithm, providing a robust layer of security for your messages.

Self-Destructing Messages: Users can set timers for messages, enhancing confidentiality. Messages become inaccessible after a specified time, reducing the risk of exposure.

Flexible Key Options: SecureMessage allows users to choose between using a custom secret key or the default option. Users can share the secret key with their recipients, enabling them to decrypt messages.

Intuitive Interface: The extension offers a user-friendly design for seamless navigation, prioritizing simplicity and ensuring a secure communication experience.

With these updates, SecureMessage continues to provide a secure and user-centric platform for confidential conversations, now with added flexibility in key management.
